title: Social Competency Enhancement Course Through Hybrid Educational Escape Games

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic organizational management concepts and team project experience
context.additional_context: A social domain education program for practicing professionals, conducted through blended learning activities using personal devices (BYOD) in offline classroom settings

learning_goals: Learners can apply collaborative skills with over 80% participation in team-based problem-solving processes.
Learners can improve critical thinking skills regarding social situations by 20% compared to pre-assessments through escape game missions.
Learners can execute creative problem-solving strategies with over 90% success in a blended learning environment integrating digital-physical cues.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
